column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////We were looking for a place we've never been to before to try breakfast at in our neighborhood and we came across Common Bond Cafe & Bakery. It's such a cute spot. With an array of pastries to choose from
column2: as well as different coffee drinks
column3: there's also a full food menu. I wanted to be on the "safe" side and chose something that I knew wouldn't fail me and that was the French toast. Let me to tell
column4: it was so good!!! They use challah bread
column5: which is my favorite for French toast
column6: it's served with some amazing tasting strawberries and bacon. I was pleased with my entire meal. They also have mimosas
column7: which we had a carafe of mango mimosas. Definitely no complaints there lol! Â Because who doesn't love mimosas!
